belongs_to_collection.name: Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった怖い話15周年スペシャル
overview: Seven scary true horror stories in this 15th anniversary special. The stories are: S Douzan no Onna (Woman from Copper mine S); Satoru-kun; Hannin wa Dare da (Who's the Crmininal?); Sasoi no Mori (Forest invitation); Ude wo Choudai (Give me your arm); Takushi Doraiba wa Kataru (A story from taxi driver) and Yami e no Shikaku (Vision to the Darkness)
title: Hontô ni Atta Kowai Hanashi: 15th Anniversary Special
